Description: Ostracon, fragment (joining 58918 and other unnumbered fragments) of the body of a light-brown pottery jar with slightly convex sides, the fabric is relatively coarse and black-grey in section, the exterior, very worn in parts, is covered with buff-coloured slip and remains of at least seven lines (3 + 4) of black-painted demotic text.
Curator's comments: From same pot as 1927,1011.182 Being studied for publication by Bryan Kraemer. Thoth 'Great of 5' Group
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393508) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393508)
